Key Match Events: Asnawi Mangkualam scored the match only goal from a penalty kick in the 42nd minute
Le Pham Thanh Long received a second yellow card followed by a red card
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the second defeat in a row for the Vietnam national team
Others: Indonesia's defender #14 Asnawi Mangkualam celebrates after scoring his team's first goal from the penalty spot
Indonesia have to win their upcoming match against Japan to secure a spot in the last 16
Vietnam put strong pressure in an attempt to come back in the match
In the second Half, Vietnam defender, Le Pham Thanh Long received a second yellow card followed by a red card
Indonesia's goalkeeper, Hernando Arri, excelled defending his goal, ending up named Player of the Match
